overview: The horny hardcore home movies of America's bustiest housewife have been compiled and digitally mastered on this brand new DVD. All of Diane's XXX scenes, including The Best of Diane, My Ex-Wife Diane, Diane's Exercise and Swimming video, and Diane Poppos' Leg Foot and Smoking Video. Her dirt bag ex-husband shot this in "happier days", and sold it to us before Diane's attorney could get his hands on it. Now it's all here on one gigantic volume packed with XXX action for you to enjoy!
title: The Diane Poppos Collection
